text: The minister of public services and procurement () is the minister of the Crown in the Canadian Cabinet who is responsible for overseeing the Government of Canada's "common service organization" (Public Services and Procurement Canada), an expansive department responsible for the internal servicing and administration of the federal government. A flavour for the department is given by the list of acts and regulations for which it is responsible."Acts and Regulations" page for the Department of Public Works The minister of public services and procurement is also the receiver general for Canada. The minister is responsible for the Phoenix pay system. The Defence Production Act grants the minister "exclusive authority to buy or otherwise acquire defence supplies and construct defence projects required by the Department of National Defence".
